text: Slattocks is a proposed railway station in Castleton, Greater Manchester. It would be located between and in the Metropolitan Borough of Rochdale. The station is a proposal by Transport for Greater ManchesterPlace North West https://www.placenorthwest.co.uk/news/rochdale-maps-out-railway-station- masterplan/ to support land development at Stakehill.GMSF Draft 2019 paragraph 11.49 https://www.greatermanchester- ca.gov.uk/media/1710/gm_plan_for_homes_jobs_and_the_environment_1101-web.pdf ==References== Category:Proposed railway stations in England
title: Slattocks railway station
